doc:
Robert Addie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Addie 0 Robert Alastair Addie (10 February 1960 – 20 November 2003) was an English film and theatre actor, who came to prominence playing the role of Sir Guy of Gisbourne in the 1980s British television drama series Robin of Sherwood. Robert_Alastair_Addie ( 10_February_1960 – 20_November_2003 ) was an_English_film_and_theatre_actor , who came to prominence playing the_role of Sir_Guy of Gisbourne in the_1980s_British_television_drama_series_Robin of Sherwood .
